title: Building Dreams, Crafting Excellence
desc: At Pothineni Constructions, we transform ideas into reality with precision, quality, and innovation. From dream homes to commercial landmarks, we build with integrity and expertise.

tabs.title: Villas
tabs.description: Experience luxury living in elegantly designed villas that blend sophistication with comfort. Nestled in serene surroundings, these spacious homes feature premium architecture, lush green landscapes, and world-class amenities. Enjoy breathtaking views, private gardens, and state-of-the-art interiors with high-end fittings. Whether you seek relaxation by the poolside, a modern home office, or an exclusive entertainment space, these villas provide the perfect setting for a lavish lifestyle. Each villa is designed to offer privacy, security, and an unparalleled living experience, making it the ultimate dream home.

tabs.title: Independent Buildings
tabs.description: Discover the charm of independent houses designed for ultimate comfort and privacy. These spacious homes offer ample room for families to grow, with personalized interiors, large balconies, and exclusive outdoor spaces. Unlike apartments, independent houses provide complete freedom in terms of customization, ensuring that every aspect of your home reflects your unique style. Enjoy peaceful living without the constraints of shared walls, with the added advantage of a private garden, parking area, and rooftop terrace. Perfect for those who value personal space and long-term investment, independent houses provide a lifestyle that balances tradition with modern living.

tabs.title: Apartments
tabs.description: Explore modern apartments that offer state-of-the-art amenities and the convenience of urban living. Designed for contemporary lifestyles, these apartments come equipped with world-class facilities such as fitness centers, swimming pools, kids' play areas, and 24/7 security. Located in prime areas, they provide easy access to schools, offices, shopping malls, and entertainment hubs. Whether you're a young professional, a growing family, or a retiree looking for a hassle-free lifestyle, apartments offer a perfect blend of comfort, community, and connectivity. With sleek interiors, open layouts, and energy-efficient designs, these apartments redefine modern living with a touch of luxury.

desc: Discover the perfect home that suits your lifestyle. Whether you seek a modern apartment with top-notch amenities, a spacious independent house with private space, or a luxurious villa with breathtaking views, we offer the finest choices to elevate your living experience.

carousel.title: Skilled Workforce
carousel.description: Highly trained professionals ensuring quality construction.

carousel.title: Safety First
carousel.description: Strict safety protocols to protect workers and the environment.

carousel.title: Sustainable Practices
carousel.description: Eco-friendly building methods for a greener future.

accordion.title: About Pothineni Constructions
accordion.content: Pothineni Constructions is a renowned name in the construction industry, delivering high-quality projects with innovation and precision. Our commitment to excellence ensures that every structure we build stands the test of time.

accordion.title: Our Vision & Commitment
accordion.content: We strive to redefine construction excellence by prioritizing sustainability, safety, and superior craftsmanship in every project. Our goal is to create spaces that seamlessly blend functionality with aesthetic appeal.

accordion.title: Why Choose Us?
accordion.content: With years of industry expertise and a dedicated team, we bring innovation, reliability, and unmatched quality to every construction endeavor. We believe in building not just structures but long-term relationships based on trust and excellence.

title: Our Specifications
desc: Explore the high-quality materials and modern construction standards that define our homes. From robust structures to elegant interiors, every detail is designed for durability, comfort, and style.

grid.title: Structure
grid.description: R.C.C. pile foundation with AAC blocks (Light weight bricks) / Clay bricks in cement mortar.

grid.title: Flooring
grid.description: Vitrified tiles in utility/wash area. Marble tiles in hall, dining, kitchen, bedrooms, toilets and balconies.

grid.title: Doors
grid.description: Teak wood frames having good quality of flush doors with hardware fittings for both main and internal doors.

grid.title: Windows
grid.description: Reputed make UPVC sliding windows fitted with iron grills and glass.

grid.title: Kitchen
grid.description: Granite top platform and stainless steel sink. Provision for fixing water purifier, exhaust fan, and chimney.

grid.title: Toilets
grid.description: Each toilet will have one wash basin, EWC/WC, shower point, glazed tiles up to 7' height for walls and CP fittings.

grid.title: Painting
grid.description: Putty for internal walls, exterior emulsion for external wall, plastic emulsion for ceiling, and enamel paint (2 coatings) for doors.

grid.title: Electrical
grid.description: Concealed copper wiring in modular switches. Adequate fan, TV, telephone points and 15A/5A power plugs.

grid.title: Roads
grid.description: Black top roads as per R&B specifications / CC roads.

grid.title: Plantation
grid.description: Planting trees along the road sides covering the entire avenue.

grid.title: Water
grid.description: Municipal water provision, water sump and water tank up to 2000 litres capacity to individual house.

grid.title: Sewage
grid.description: Open drainage canals and septic tank to individual house.
